enum: Subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing (SDH)

last_modified.description: Date and time of last update to metadata record. ( context : movie_db_ZIB ) ( ref: last_modified@21.T11148/a27923f25913583b1ea6 )

physical_descriptions.description: implicitly created because of multiple occurence of child type 'physical_description': The broad media type of the Item (e.g., film, video, audio, optical, digital file). Recording this high-level information will enable simple searching for only film, video, digital, etc. elements rather than searching by all possible formats and carriers. ( context : movie_db_ZIB ) ( ref: physical_descriptions@21.T11148/d130a04670f3825a123b )

items.description: The broad media type of the Item (e.g., film, video, audio, optical, digital file). Recording this high-level information will enable simple searching for only film, video, digital, etc. elements rather than searching by all possible formats and carriers. ( context : movie_db_ZIB ) ( ref: physical_description@21.T11148/0fab4d3181e8ce0d91d2 )

preservation_access_status.description: Description of the preservation or access status of the dataObject, for example Master, Viewing, etc. Select term from a controlled list. (Context: AV-EFI) ( ref: preservation_access_status@21.T11148/ec53e13cba99d01e6ff2 )

same_as.description: This dataObject may come from a joint digitization effort of more than one institution. After the digitization it is common practice to supply all the participating institutions with the digital Objects, so there may be other dataObjects identical to this one. ( context : movie_db_ZIB ) ( ref: same_as@21.T11148/d95bff728d4dd304ae86 )

sourceDate.description: combined date and time representations as string. It refers to RFC3339 and ISO 8601 and allows to give just date, week or ordinal date notation and combined date and time in UTC. Defined by regular expression. ( ref: date-time-weak@21.T11148/9ca79b6ce26f3fd4fad3 )
